observations: Values in the input grid are copied to all cells above and below them in the same column.
Values propagate until they encounter another non-zero value, or the edge of the grid.
hypotheses: Copy each number vertically until the top or bottom is reached, overwriting zeros.
Copy each number vertically until another number is encountered.
selected_rule: Copy each number vertically until another number is encountered.
step_plan: For each column, iterate from top to bottom.
If a non-zero value is found, copy that value to all subsequent zero-valued cells in the same column, until the end or until another non-zero value is found.
For each column, iterate from bottom to top.
If a non-zero value is found, copy that value to all preceding zero-valued cells in the same column, until the top or until another non-zero value is found.
